title: Searching for black swans
summary: The text describes a user's experience of receiving an initiation into the flaws of capitalism when their profitable company's value suddenly dropped. The author argues that this is not a flaw of capitalism, but rather a natural occurrence. The user then mentions a garage sale where they found a $20 NES, implying that finding valuable items at a low price is also not a flaw of capitalism. The text then transitions to an advertisement for an AI Startup School.
